data.name: VR Paradise - Outfits pack : Spring Break Bikinis
data.detailed_description:
Celebrate Spring Break with this bikini clothing pack!


This DLC contains 1 new bikini outfit per mesh !

They were named after famous cocktails that we love to taste during Spring Break :)

  • White russian
  • Strawberry shake
  • Pina Colada
  • Bloody mary
  • Cuba libre
  • Grenadine punch
  • Green River
  • Americano perfecto

The DLC also contains 2 accessories (2 pairs of glasses) available for all girls and 1 cold beer unlocked in your inventory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7–7700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2080 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or greater
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
VR Paradise is a virtual striptease club that offers 3 types of sexual content:

- Pole-dances on stage with topless dancers.
- Table dances with close-up topless dancers.
- Performances in a private room during which the dancers undress completely (frontal depiction of the female genitals).
